verses.text: Come \w near|strong="H7126"\w*, ye \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, to \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*; and \w hearken|strong="H7181"\w*, ye \w people|strong="H3816"\w*: let the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, and all that is \w therein|strong="H4393"\w*; the \w world|strong="H8398"\w*, and all things that come \w forth|strong="H6631"\w* of it.\f + \fr 34.1 \ft all that…: Heb. the fulness thereof\f*

For the \w indignation|strong="H7110"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* upon all \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, and \add his\add* \w fury|strong="H2534"\w* upon all their \w armies|strong="H6635"\w*: he hath utterly \w destroyed|strong="H2763"\w* them, he hath \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* them to the \w slaughter|strong="H2874"\w*.

Their \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* also shall be cast \w out|strong="H7993"\w*, and their \w stink|strong="H0889"\w* shall come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* out of their \w carcases|strong="H6297"\w*, and the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* shall be \w melted|strong="H4549"\w* with their \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*.

And all the \w host|strong="H6635"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* shall be \w dissolved|strong="H4743"\w*, and the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* shall be rolled \w together|strong="H1556"\w* as a \w scroll|strong="H5612"\w*: and all their \w host|strong="H6635"\w* shall fall \w down|strong="H5034"\w*, as the \w leaf|strong="H5929"\w* falleth \w off|strong="H5034"\w* from the \w vine|strong="H1612"\w*, and as a \w falling|strong="H5034"\w* \add fig\add* from the fig \w tree|strong="H8384"\w*.

For my \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* shall be \w bathed|strong="H7301"\w* in \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*: behold, it shall come \w down|strong="H3381"\w* upon \w Idumea|strong="H0123"\w*, and upon the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of my \w curse|strong="H2764"\w*, to \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*.

The \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* is \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* with \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, it is made \w fat|strong="H1878"\w* with \w fatness|strong="H2459"\w*, \add and\add* with the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of \w lambs|strong="H3733"\w* and \w goats|strong="H6260"\w*, with the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* of the \w kidneys|strong="H3629"\w* of \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*: for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath a \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* in \w Bozrah|strong="H1224"\w*, and a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H2874"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Idumea|strong="H0123"\w*.

And the \w unicorns|strong="H7214"\w* shall come \w down|strong="H3381"\w* with them, and the \w bullocks|strong="H6499"\w* with the \w bulls|strong="H0047"\w*; and their \w land|strong="H0776"\w* shall be \w soaked|strong="H7301"\w* with \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, and their \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* made \w fat|strong="H1878"\w* with \w fatness|strong="H2459"\w*.\f + \fr 34.7 \ft unicorns: or, rhinocerots\f*\f + \fr 34.7 \ft soaked: or, drunken\f*

For \add it is\add* the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w vengeance|strong="H5359"\w*, \add and\add* the \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w recompences|strong="H7966"\w* for the \w controversy|strong="H7379"\w* of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*.

And the \w streams|strong="H5158"\w* thereof shall be \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* into \w pitch|strong="H2203"\w*, and the \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* thereof into \w brimstone|strong="H1614"\w*, and the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* thereof shall become \w burning|strong="H1197"\w* \w pitch|strong="H2203"\w*.

It shall not be \w quenched|strong="H3518"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* nor \w day|strong="H3119"\w*; the \w smoke|strong="H6227"\w* thereof shall go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*: from \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* to \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* it shall lie \w waste|strong="H2717"\w*; none shall pass \w through|strong="H5674"\w* it for \w ever|strong="H5331"\w* and \w ever|strong="H5331"\w*.

¶ But the \w cormorant|strong="H6893"\w* and the \w bittern|strong="H7090"\w* shall \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* it; the \w owl|strong="H3244"\w* also and the \w raven|strong="H6158"\w* shall \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* in it: and he shall stretch \w out|strong="H5186"\w* upon it the \w line|strong="H6957"\w* of \w confusion|strong="H8414"\w*, and the \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* of \w emptiness|strong="H0922"\w*.\f + \fr 34.11 \ft cormorant: or, pelican\f*

They shall \w call|strong="H7121"\w* the \w nobles|strong="H2715"\w* thereof to the \w kingdom|strong="H4410"\w*, but none \add shall be\add* there, and all her \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* shall be \w nothing|strong="H0657"\w*.

And \w thorns|strong="H5518"\w* shall come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* in her \w palaces|strong="H0759"\w*, \w nettles|strong="H7057"\w* and \w brambles|strong="H2336"\w* in the \w fortresses|strong="H4013"\w* thereof: and it shall be an \w habitation|strong="H5116"\w* of \w dragons|strong="H8577"\w*, \add and\add* a \w court|strong="H2681"\w* for \w owls|strong="H1323"\w*.\f + \fr 34.13 \ft owls: or, ostriches: Heb. daughters of the owl\f*

The wild beasts of the \w desert|strong="H6728"\w* shall also \w meet|strong="H6298"\w* with the wild beasts of the \w island|strong="H0338"\w*, and the \w satyr|strong="H8163"\w* shall \w cry|strong="H7121"\w* to his \w fellow|strong="H7453"\w*; the screech \w owl|strong="H3917"\w* also shall \w rest|strong="H7280"\w* there, and \w find|strong="H4672"\w* for herself a place of \w rest|strong="H4494"\w*.\f + \fr 34.14 \ft The wild beasts of the desert: Heb. Ziim\f*\f + \fr 34.14 \ft the wild beasts of the island: Heb. Ijim\f*\f + \fr 34.14 \ft screech…: or, night monster\f*

There shall the great \w owl|strong="H7091"\w* make her \w nest|strong="H7077"\w*, and \w lay|strong="H4422"\w*, and \w hatch|strong="H1234"\w*, and \w gather|strong="H1716"\w* under her \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w*: there shall the \w vultures|strong="H1772"\w* also be \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w*, every \w one|strong="H0802"\w* with her \w mate|strong="H7468"\w*.

¶ Seek ye \w out|strong="H1875"\w* of the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w read|strong="H7121"\w*: no \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of \w these|strong="H2007"\w* shall \w fail|strong="H5737"\w*, \w none|strong="H0802"\w* shall \w want|strong="H6485"\w* her \w mate|strong="H7468"\w*: for my \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* it hath \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*, and his \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* it hath \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* them.

And he hath \w cast|strong="H5307"\w* the \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* for them, and his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* hath \w divided|strong="H2505"\w* it unto them by \w line|strong="H6957"\w*: they shall \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* it \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*, from \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* to \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* shall they \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* therein.
